i1.name: Ki Barrier
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} After completing an ability's effects, '''Shen''' {{tip|shields}} himself from {{passive progression/deprecated version|60 to 111}} {{as|(+ 14% '''bonus''' health)}} damage for {{fd|2.5}} seconds. If the triggering ability successfully affected at least one {{tip|champion}}, ''Ki Barrier's'' {{sti|cooldown}} is reduced by {{passive progression/deprecated version|8|4|4.5|5|5.5|6|6.5|7|7.5|1|6|9|12|14|16|17|18}} seconds.
'''Shen's''' power manifests as a {{as|Spirit Blade|buzzword}} that he can control with his abilities.
i1.notes:
* The {{as|Spirit Blade|buzzword}} spawns with '''Shen''', teleports closer to him if he gets too far away, and instantly blinks to him if he uses any global {{tip|blink}} ({{si|Teleport}}, {{si|Recall}}, {{ai|Abyssal Voyage|Tahm Kench}}, or {{ai|Stand United|Shen}}).
* Enemies see an arrow pointing from '''Shen''' to the location of his {{as|Spirit Blade|buzzword}} even if it is not visible.
* {{ai|Twilight Assault|Shen}} will grant the shield if the {{as|Spirit Blade|buzzword}} reaches '''Shen'''. If it is stopped, no shield is granted.
* {{ai|Spirit's Refuge|Shen}} will give the shield after the protective zone disappears.
* {{ai|Shadow Dash|Shen}} will give the shield when the dash ends.
** If the dash is {{tip|interrupt|interrupted}}, the shield will instead be received the moment the {{tip|crowd control}} source is applied, before damage calculation (if any).

w1.name: Spirit's Refuge
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Shen''' primes his {{as|Spirit Blade|buzzword}}, creating an area around it. If '''Shen''' or an allied champion enter or are within the area, or after 2 seconds, the {{as|Spirit Blade|buzzword}} creates a protective zone around it for {{fd|1.75}} seconds, {{tip|block|blocking}} all non-{{tip|turret}} [[basic attack]]s that hit '''Shen''' or allied champions in the area.
w1.notes:
* ''Spirit's Refuge's'' protective zone can be moved while active if '''Shen''' uses {{ai|Twilight Assault|Shen}}.
* ''Spirit's Refuge'' cannot be ranked up at [[Experience (champion)|Level]] 1.
* ''Spirit's Refuge'' will also block damage from all abilities that use {{tip|basic damage}} ({{ai|Lunge|Fiora}}, {{ai|Mystic Shot|Ezreal}}, {{ai|Steel Tempest|Yasuo}}).

e1.name: Shadow Dash
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} Damage from ''Shadow Dash'' and {{ai|Twilight Assault|Shen}} recovers {{sti|energy|{{as|{{passive progression/deprecated version|3|30 to 40|1;4;12}} energy}}}}.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Shen''' {{tip|dashes}} to the target location, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to all enemy champions and {{tip|monsters}} in his path and {{tip|taunt|taunting}} them for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
e1.notes:
* Casting {{si|Flash}} during ''Shadow Dash'' will end the dash prematurely, but enemies at the [[blink|blink's]] location will count as being hit by the ability.
** This cannot affect the same enemy more than once.
